features.name: All-Inclusive Experience
features.description: Full access to all events, all meals and beverages, and the opportunity to enjoy all activities throughout the experience.

features.name: Community Vibes
features.description: Perfect for groups and friends looking to share the experience and space.

features.name: Heated Outdoor Pool
features.description: Enjoy the 12x5m heated pool and soak up the sun on the terrace.

features.name: Shared Kitchens & Dining
features.description: Access to communal kitchen areas and banquet-style dining settings.

features.name: Expansive Natural Grounds
features.description: Roam freely through the 22 acres of gardens, forest paths, and green spaces.

disclaimer: Custom room assignments honored upon request
